snippet.title: RPG Band of Monsters - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
©2013 KEMCO/Hit-Point

Tame, mix, create strong monsters and enjoy online battles! 
RPG Band of Monsters is now available for Android!

Get it now on:

Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.hitpoint.mateki&hl=en

A young monster tamer, Zara, can tame monsters using the "tuning" technique. One day, he meets a mysterious girl named Fene, also called the "Pendulum". Fene is pursued by soldiers of Ventos, who made the world's monsters violent using a forbidden power. To learn Fene's true identity, Zara's adventure with various monsters begins now...

- Get new monsters by 'tuning' them!
- Mix two monsters to create a new one!
- Battle other players online!

※All graphics terms, characters and elements are subject to change in the actual product.
